summary: Platform component accessed by non-Red Hat SRE user
description: A user on your system has accessed or modified a platform component, ${COMPONENT}, which is the responsibility of Red Hat SRE. Tampering with platform components can endanger SLAs. Please refer to https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/introduction_to_rosa/policies-and-service-definition#rosa-policy-responsibility-matrix.
